description: At GAF, we cover more than buildings. We cover each other. No matter what role, tenure, or track, under this roof you are empowered to be there for your teammates, your customers, and especially your community. Under this roof, we don't back down from hard work- we support one another in pursuit of something bigger. We define the future while leading the present. title: Life & Annuity Actuarial Illustrations Systems Analyst
description: Guardian is seeking an Actuarial Illustrations Systems Analyst to join the Individual Life and Annuity Product Illustrations Team. Working with a team of professionals, you will complete plans to implement new life and annuity products, features, and enhancements in Guardian's innovative, critically important illustration system, the Guardian Proposal System (GPS). You will be responsible for translating life & annuity actuarial product descriptions into detailed and comprehensive illustration …
